questions.question: When I pass my final English exam I'm going to .......... and not open the course book for the next month or two

choices.answer: rest on my laurels
pull my socks up

questions.question: When our teacher sees that you are cheating in the test, you'll ........... .

choices.answer: be in the soup
rest on one's laurels

questions.question: Ben passed his FCE exam with ............. He got a straight A. He can celebrate now!

choices.answer: falling colours
flying colours

questions.question: Kate is having a hard time at home now when her parents are divorcing, but she just has to ........

choices.answer: weather the storm
skate on thin ice

questions.question: Tony boasted he was going to play a trick on our English teacher but at the last moment he ....... and didn't do it.

choices.answer: moved heaven and earth
got cold feet
